name.value: Load Test Resources - Purge Create Update - XML

description.value: Load test resources using the update (PUT) operation of the target FHIR server for use in testing. All resource ids are pre-defined. The target XIS FHIR server is expected to support resource create via the update (PUT) operation for client assigned ids.
Date that data and queries are expected to be relative to.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK) or 204(No Content)

Load test resources using the update (PUT) operation of the target FHIR server for use in testing. All resource ids are pre-defined. The target XIS FHIR server is expected to support resource create via the update (PUT) operation for client assigned ids.
